displayName.text: Maheshkumar Shah, DDS - Dentist in North Bergen

formattedAddress: 1791 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1791 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029-2800, USA

originalText.text: Dr.Shah is an amazing dentist ! Staff is very friendly and his work is impeccable. He has a great deal of experience and takes the time to explain the procedure and follow up with any concerns you may have. Prices are very fair compared to other dentist. If you are looking for a dentist in the NYC area I highly recommend Dr.Shah.

text.text: Dr.Shah is an amazing dentist ! Staff is very friendly and his work is impeccable. He has a great deal of experience and takes the time to explain the procedure and follow up with any concerns you may have. Prices are very fair compared to other dentist. If you are looking for a dentist in the NYC area I highly recommend Dr.Shah.

originalText.text: I recently broke a tooth and contacted Dr. Shah's office for an appointment. I was quite nervous but he assured me would be able to fix it. I was given an appointment immediately. Upon arriving the office it seemed a bit dated. I was greeted by Dr. Shah's office manager Evelyn who is an absolute gem. She's very friendly and professional.  I did not wait long to see him. Dr. Shah examined me and said I needed a root canal. He was up front with the  cost and very thorough in the procedure. You could tell he is very experienced. There was minimal pain. He took the time to answered all my questions.  I would refer anyone to Dr. Shah for dental treatment.

originalText.text: Dr Shah has been my family dentist for more then 30 years I highly recommend for all ages best dentist ever

originalText.text: An excellent dentist and all around friendly person. Everyone who works there is courteous and it feels like family. Highly recommend.
